title: Jari Ketomaa
text:
Jari Ketomaa (born 18 April 1979) is a <a href="Finland">Finnish</a> former <a href="rallying">rally</a> driver.
Career.
A former <a href="kart%20racing">kart racer</a>, Ketomaa started rallying in 1995. He made his <a href="World%20Rally%20Championship">World Rally Championship</a> debut in 2000 at <a href="Rally%20Finland">Rally Finland</a>. He won the <a href="Group%20N">Group N</a> class of the <a href="Finnish%20Rally%20Championship">Finnish Rally Championship</a> in 2006 and 2007. In 2008, he competed a full season in the <a href="Production%20World%20Rally%20Championship">Production World Rally Championship</a>, finishing the season third in the standings. Ketomaa regained the Finnish Group N title in 2009. He also made his debut in a <a href="World%20Rally%20Car">World Rally Car</a> at <a href="2009%20Rally%20Finland">2009 Rally Finland</a>, finishing seventh overall. In 2010, Ketomaa is competing in the <a href="Super%202000%20World%20Rally%20Championship">Super 2000 World Rally Championship</a> in a <a href="Ford%20Fiesta%20S2000">Ford Fiesta S2000</a>. In 2011 Ketomaa raced in Rally Finland with <a href="Ford%20Fiesta%20RS%20WRC">Ford Fiesta RS WRC</a> and lead after first special stage but later retired from top 5 position.
